+class Animal:%0A    def __init__(self, specie:str, sound:str): #aq o construtor bixa%0A        self.specie: str=specie%0A        self.sound: str=sound%0A        self.age: int=0%0A%0A    def __str__(self) -%3E str: #aq o toString bixa%0A        return f%22%7Bself.specie%7D:%7Bself.age%7D:%7Bself.sound%7D%22%0A    %0A    def ageBy(self, increment:int)-%3ENone:%0A        if self.age==4:%0A            print(f%22warning: %7Bself.specie%7D morreu%22)%0A            return %0A        self.age+=increment%0A        if self.age%3E=4:%0A            self.age=4%0A            print(f%22warning: %7Bself.specie%7D morreu%22)%0A    %0A    def makeSound(self)-%3Estr: #type:ignore %0A        if self.age==0:%0A            return %22---%22%0A        if self.age==1:%0A            return self.sound%0A        if self.age==2:%0A            return self.sound%0A        if self.age==3:%0A            return self.sound%0A        if self.age==4:%0A            return %22RIP%22%0A        %0Adef main(): #aq acontece a intera%C3%A7ao com o c%C3%B3digo%0A    animal: Animal = Animal(%22%22,%22%22)%0A    while True:%0A        line: str=input()%0A        print(%22$%22+line)%0A        args:list%5Bstr%5D=line.split(%22 %22)%0A%0A        if args%5B0%5D==%22end%22:%0A            break%0A        if args%5B0%5D==%22show%22:%0A            print(animal)%0A        if args%5B0%5D==%22init%22:%0A            specie:str=args%5B1%5D%0A            sound:str=args%5B2%5D%0A            animal=Animal(specie,sound)%0A        if args%5B0%5D==%22grow%22:%0A            increment: int=int(args%5B1%5D)%0A            animal.ageBy(increment)%0A        if args%5B0%5D==%22noise%22:%0A            print(animal.makeSound())%0Amain()
